Package org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.feature

Class ZoomOut

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.ViewerFeature
      • org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.ViewerWidget
        • org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.feature.ZoomOut
  • public class ZoomOut
extends ViewerWidget
    Create a button which zooms the document out to the next level. The name of this feature is ZoomOut

    This code is copyright the Big Faceless Organization. You're welcome to use, modify and distribute it in any form in your own projects, provided those projects continue to make use of the Big Faceless PDF library.

    Since:
    2.8

      • action

        public void action​(ViewerEvent event)
        Description copied from class: ViewerWidget
        The method that's run when this feature is activated. This method is called by the ActionListener returned by the default implementation of ViewerWidget.createActionListener(), and by default is a no-op.
